description:
Hike your favourite trails with ease. Keen took their classic Targhee hiking shoe and added a flexible panel over the toes, reducing the energy needed during each step and increasing durability as it won't crack and weaken overtime. These light trail shoes are great for a variety of conditions, thanks to the waterproof membrane and all-terrain lugged sole.

  • Environmentally-preferred leather and mesh uppers for a durable and secure fit
  • Keen.Dry waterproof-breathable membrane keeps water out
  • Webbing heel capture system locks in your foot
  • Keen.Bellows Flex panel bends for an easy step
  • Dual-density, compression-moulded EVA midsole with torsion stability shank absorbs impacts and provides support
  • Non-marking Keen.All-Terrain rubber outsoles with 5mm lugs grip whatever the trail throws at you
name: Keen Ridge Flex Waterproof Light Trail Shoes - Women's
